r.s: UNL Template for PHP Documentor's HTML Converter
r.d: Provides a UNL templated html web page output for PhpDocumentor.
r.n: * Set UNL_Templates::$options["templatedependentspath"] if $_SERVER["UNL_TEMPLATEDEPENDENTSPATH"] is set. * Example in .htaccess: SetEnvIf Request_Method "GET" UNL_TEMPLATEDEPENDENTSPATH="/srv/www/htdocs"
